F_LAYOUT_OBJECT_FRONT.question: Which object is directly in front of the <OBJECT> from the camera's point of view?

F_LAYOUT_OBJECT_BEHIND.question: Which object is directly behind the <OBJECT> from the camera's point of view?

F_KINEMATICS_FASTEST_OBJECT_SPEED.question: What is the speed of the fastest object?

F_FORCE_COLLISION_OBJECT_OBJECT.question: Which object exerts the greatest force on the <OBJECT> during their collision?

F_FORCE_COLLISION_OBJECT_SCENE.question: Whit what force does the <OBJECT> collide with the scene?

F_GRAVITY_CONSISTENCY.question: Is <OBJECT>'s motion consistent with the direction of gravity?

F_MATERIAL_IDENTIFICATION_OBJECT.question: What material is the <OBJECT> made of?
